metadata.title: CVE-2021-3566 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Prior to ffmpeg version 4.3, the tty demuxer did not have a 'read_probe'function assigned to it. By crafting a legitimate "ffconcat" file thatreferences an image, followed by a file the triggers the tty demuxer, thecontents of the second file will be copied into the output file verbatim(as long as the `-vcodec copy` option is passed to ffmpeg).

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
